entry.title: Tuesday: Mainly sunny. High 6.
entry.summary: Mainly sunny. Wind becoming north 20 km/h this afternoon. High 6. UV index 5 or moderate. Forecast issued 11:30 AM EDT Tuesday 4 April 2023

entry.title: Tuesday night: A few clouds. Low minus 7.
entry.summary: A few clouds. Increasing cloudiness before morning. Wind becoming northeast 20 km/h this evening. Low minus 7. Wind chill minus 14 overnight. Forecast issued 11:30 AM EDT Tuesday 4 April 2023

entry.title: Wednesday: Periods of snow or ice pellets. High minus 1.
entry.summary: Cloudy. Periods of snow beginning in the morning then changing to ice pellets then changing to freezing rain in the afternoon. Wind northeast 30 km/h gusting to 50. High minus 1. Wind chill minus 14 in the morning and minus 7 in the afternoon. UV index 2 or low. Forecast issued 11:30 AM EDT Tuesday 4 April 2023
